name: Look Alive
description:
Look Alive is an open-world survival game set right after the zombie apocalypse started. You are one of the last survivors left in this world full of dead, struggling to stay alive. Despite all the difficulties, you still have hope to find a safe shelter and a cure. Will you succeed in your journey or will you die? It is up to you and how well you scavenge.

Game Features:
  • Improve your character by leveling up your skills.
  • Drive your car over zombies or maybe you’d prefer to roll them over with a Harvester?
  • Find different guns and melee weapons
  • Trade with other survivors and help struggling camps to thrive in this dead world
  • Fight Zombies, fight mutants and fight the hardest enemies: Humans.
  • Face bosses and gather loot
  • Loot stores and houses in order to survive
  • Utilize the environment to kill zombies
  • Day and Night cycles. During the night zombies get hungrier…
  • Manage your hunger and thirst
